item.title: Publications
item.description: Submitted Xianshi Yu and Ji Zhu (2023+). Modeling Hypergraphs with Diversity and Heterogeneous Popularity. Under revision. Accepted/Published Xianshi Yu and Ji Zhu (2023). Network community detection using higher order structures. Biometrika, accepted. Bing-Yi Jing, Ting Li, Ningchen Ying and Xianshi Yu (2022). Community detection in sparse networks using the symmetrized Laplacian inverse matrix (SLIM). Statistica Sinica, 32, 1-12. (The authors are ordered alphabetically.)   Shirley Cohen-Mekelburg, Tony Van, Xianshi Yu, Deena Kelly Costa, Milisa Manojlovich, Sameer Saini, Heather Gilmartin, Andrew J.

item.title: Math Support
item.description: Eureka supports the rendering of mathematical formulas by using KaTeX.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
